name: Jurassic World Builder
description:
This a Park Builder where you take control of Dinosaur Theme Park. You get to manage every aspect of Park operations from Fossil Hunts to Creature Creation. the Goal of the Game is to get a Five Star Park

Features:

Dinosaurs:

  •  50  Standard Dinosaurs
  • 12 Random Event Dinosaurs
  •  10 Hybrids 
  • and a Infinite number of Custom Hybrids 
  • And one Atomic Kaiju

Buildings:

12 Unique Building to place our your park

Game Modes:

  • 4 Difficulty Settings
  • 2 Challenges with 3 Difficulties Each
  • Sandbox Mode Where you can build with no limits

Every Creature(Except Custom Hybrids) and building is represented by a custom piece of pixel art done by me

Expect Frequent Updates because this Game is Far From Being Done!

This was my final project for my Computer Science Class and my First time making and Uploading real Game
